import { Breadcrumb, BreadcrumbItem, Button, Card, CardBody, CardTitle, Container, Row, Col, FormGroup, Input } from "reactstrap"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import _ from "lodash/fp"; import './driver.scss'; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { addDriver } from '../../store/actions'; function AddDriver(props){ const { register, handleSubmit, watch, errors } = useForm(); const history = useHistory(); const onSubmit = (event, data) => { console.log("data"); props.addDriver(data.name, data.email, data.address, data.phone, history) } return( <>

)} {_.get("email.type", errors) === "required" && (

)} {_.get("email.type", errors) === "pattern" && (

Invalid Email

)} {_.get("address.type", errors) === "required" && (

This field is required

)} {_.get("phone.type", errors) === "required" && (

This field is required

)}
); } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { loading: state.login.loading, }; }; export default connect(mapStateToProps, { addDriver })(AddDriver);
